alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 2:56AM MST until December 26 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Snow showers could cause reduced visibility and slick winter travel. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations, the Green Mountains, and the Rattlesnake Range. This includes South Pass and WY Hwy 258 (Wyoming Blvd, Outer Drive) on the south side of Casper. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Visibility could be reduced due to blowing snow.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
